header.description:
Raidplanner Plugin Installer.

header.author-notes: We hope you get everything working. further development requests, support questions are welcome at www.bbdkp.com

[CHG] UCP module is no longer optional, is installed with umil not in modx
[CHG] Removed config table, now uses phpbb config table.
[CHG] changed tablenames, appends table constants to bbDKP constants file
[CHG] split backend /includes code and refactored into php5 classes
[CHG] added UMIF installer script, removed sql portions from modx
[CHG] split modx file into main, template and language
[CHG] mod renamed and version number back to 0.0.1

action-group.diy-instructions: Run database installer : Browse to install/installrp.php. This will install the Raidplanner database tables, the ACP and UCP modules, purge the cache and refresh the template, imagesets and themes. Note that if you run a Style other than Prosilver, you will need to apply the Prosilver changes to your style either manually - by following the edit instructions in prosilver.xml, or by automatically, by going into the "Detail" tab in Automod and applying the Prosilver changes to yur style.
